description: This file defines the Java class 'ConfigRestoredInput', which implements object IPC messaging related to configuration restoration. It contains fields for restore directory and dynamic config path, accessor methods, JSON serialization/deserialization, and overrides the toString method.

classes.name: ConfigRestoredInput
classes.description: A class for IPC message handling configuration restoration, providing JSON encoding/decoding and standard accessor methods.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the object.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Encodes the object into a JSON format.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Decodes the object from a JSON structure.
